extendedInfo.description: In response to user feedback, our superb GPS guide is even better! We updated Road to Hana on August 18 to adjust our approach signals based on your driving speed. You should still go slow to enjoy the ride!Maui Road to Hana is THE GPS based, audio-enhanced guide that ensures you will never miss a site on this incredible journey.Mauiâs Road to HanaSure, any number of books can tell you approximately how to find a place. But, since many of the interesting sites on the Hana Highway have no signs, these books use âmile markersâ. This means that you have to look at the side of the road for these signs, while driving on a slow, winding, and unfamiliar highway. How fun is that?With Maui Road to Hana, you receive audio notifications before you come to a site. Then when you arrive, a display pops up with a picture of the place. You get to enjoy the sights and sounds of the Hana Highway, and Maui Road to Hana does the rest.Maui Road to Hana does not require a cell phone connection for our notifications to alert you. Thatâs a good thing, too, because for much of the drive your reception will be spotty at best. Here are just two of the over 40 places that Maui Road to Hana contains:- The Charles Lindbergh grave. Our guide alerts you not only to the church in which the grave is located, but also to the turnoff for the side road that takes you there.- Alelele Falls. This little-known section of Haleakala National Park is a great place for a short hike and a dip in an uncrowded pool. Maui Road to Hana guide leads you right to the spot. Maui Road to Hana features:* Over 100 photographs* Over 40 Hana Highway sites, including waterfalls, hikes, markets, and beaches* Road turnoff and hazard notifications* Custom computer voice algorithm for improved Hawaiian name pronunciation* Automatic prompt for voice navigation to the preferred first stop of your trip.Save Your Favorites===================You can pin your favorite Maui Road to Hana stops for easy, one-touch access.Search Maui Road to Hana========================Search for information by using the search key on your phone.A Note about Offline Maps=========================Maui Road to Hana audio visual notifications work as long as you have a GPS satellite connection. Cell connection is not required for this. Our app is designed to give you hands free assistance.The Google Map displayed does require a cell connection. If you want to have a map to accompany you when you have no cell connection, we suggest you do as our reviewers recommend, and download an offline map into the Google Maps Android app itself.Happy and safe driving to you!

reviews.title: Indispensable guide
reviews.comment: This one took me by surprise as I was not expecting anything great given the low cost. It enriched our road trip to Hana by helping us decide where and when to stop. The voice guide made it feel like we had a tour guide in the car with us.
reviews.author: Warren Steiner

reviews.title: Good for the price
reviews.comment: Did this drive alone so the voice commands were useful.   App worked well, but  could be improved by giving a description of the location when you\'re approaching instead of as you pass it.  This  would  let you knows what\'s coming up to plan if you want to stop or not.
reviews.author: Sam Noertker

reviews.title: A must if going to muai!!!!
reviews.comment: Worked great once u get the hang of it love the advice it gives u wish there was a way to add notes for others to see like take hiking shoes and pack a lunch cuase there really isn\'t much up there as far as food. But the the price it worked great...
reviews.author: Alberto Flores

reviews.title: A Must buy
reviews.comment: It worked great. It told us about most stops in great detail. Had I not purchased this app I would have missed a lot of great spots on the road to Hana. Only complaint is that it was confusing to use but once we started the app to Hana it guided us through everything.
reviews.author: Hashmat Bahaduri

reviews.title: Best 99cents ever spent
reviews.comment: Loved the app. Only thing I wished was that it gave a little bit of a heads up as to when the sites are coming. They tell u right when u get there, when it\'s too late to pull over & park. We missed a couple spots due to that reason.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Well worth the price
reviews.comment: We used the app today on the road.  It worked great and was filled with information not in my wife\'s travel book.  We drove back long after sunset and the GPS guide did an excellent job of letting us know where we were at and which stops we were passing by in the darkness.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Perfectly Accurate
reviews.comment: The electronic voice is annoying but the app works just right and is accurate on locations.  It was often calling out the highlights I was reading about in Maui Revealed.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great idea, needs major fix.
reviews.comment: Used this app yesterday, and it worked fairly well. It was really nice to know which stop we were approaching. However, the details for each stop were provided after we passed and were driving by. Not useful if you are trying to decide whether or not to stop. The app needs to be  updated to provide details at same time as approach message.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Wow
reviews.comment: I really didn\'t expect much from this app but it worked amazingly well better than all the guide books. Gives you exact details and how to get into a certain place. Highly recommended worth more than 99 cents. I do agree though it should give more of a heads up.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Okay
reviews.comment: This app worked fine, but doesn\'t really have the \"hidden gems\" so to speak. Fine for all of the main attractions.
reviews.author: Eric Zingmark

reviews.title: not bad for a price and lack of alternatives
reviews.comment: it works but robo voice reading comments is horrible and annoying.
reviews.author: Eugene Roytman

reviews.title: I must drive too fast...
reviews.comment: I did get a heads up until we were at or passing the sights.   App is okay but could use some polish.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Very nice
reviews.comment: Great app, a must for traveling the road to Hana.  What I liked best was how it gave you a heads up prior to reaching stopping points so you could start looking for parking.  Good information on the stops.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great app
reviews.comment: Great app. Keep your gps on it continues to work even when you have no signal. Way easier than using the crude resort maps. Make your google maps map of Maui available offline
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Phone freeze during install
reviews.comment: DO NOT BUY THIS APP. I can\'t even get this app to install properly. About 30 secs into the the installation process my phone froze requiring a battery pull to reboot. I\'ve tried 5 times to install this app without any luck. I\'ve emailed the developer twice for help and have not received any response. I bought this app for our road trip to Hana and that day has already past so this app is worthless.
reviews.author: David Him

reviews.title: Highly Recommend! !!!!!
reviews.comment: The road to Hannah isn\'t the same without this app! !!!! Full GPS and stop info.....
reviews.author: TC Heike

reviews.title: Didn\'t work
reviews.comment: work for about  minute until out of cell distance then no more
reviews.author: A Google User
